S08sdurst_u:475_2: vajraghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ ca yady amaṇḍalino vadet //
S08sdurst_u:476_0: tataḥ sarvavidhim anuṣṭhāya nāmāṣṭaśatena saṃstutya gāthāpañcakenānujñāṃ datvodgatanvyākaraṇena sarvaśiṣyān sarvaśiṣyān vyākuryād iti /
S08sdurst_u:477_0: atha guhyābhiṣeko bhavati / ācāryābhiṣekārhaṃ praveśya sarvamaṇḍalaṃ tu tat kurusva / iti /
S08sdurst_u:478_2: nirvighnena parāṃ bhūmiṃ kiṃ punaḥ kṣudrasiddhayaḥ //
S08sdurst_u:478_4: yasya siddhir nirjāyate yasya pāpā mahāgrahāḥ //
S08sdurst_u:478_8: te tasya naśyanti nāpi jāyante ca mahottamā //
S08sdurst_u:478_10: devatāś ca mahātuṣṭīṃ pralabhanti kṣaṇena ca //
S08sdurst_u:478_14: devā nāgā mahotsāhāḥ pālayantī sukhena tu //
S08sdurst_u:478_57: yena likhet paṭhed vāpi dhārayed arthataḥ sadā //
S08sdurst_u:478_58: smaret śṛṇuyād vāpi vajrapāṇisamo bhavet // iti /
S08sdurst_u:479_1: śakrabrahmādidevaparṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvayakṣasādibhir hitasukhaprāptaye bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti /
